alert.note: Alert for Humacao; Yabucoa (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 21 at 9:10PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Humacao and Yabucoa. * WHEN...Until 1115 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Water over roadways. River or stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 806 PM AST, the public reported heavy rain in At least one lane... due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - At least one lane... is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - At least one lane was flooded on Highway 3. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
